body.name: Jessica Simpson Puffer Coat For Women - Quilted Winter Coat w/Faux Fur Hood
features: *Runs Large* FEMININE STYLE: Stay warm in style all winter long in this warm and cozy mid-length puffer coat by Jessica Simpson; Trendy horizontal quilting provides style and warmth while keeping out the cold
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Water and wind resistant 100% polyester shell and insulated fill, 85% Acrylic/15% Polyester plush faux fur lined hood and trim; Machine Wash Cold. Generally runs large

DESIGN: The horizontal quilting offers a slimming silhouette while displaying effortless style; Generous mid-length construction combined with a stylish oversized faux fur lined hood is designed to protect you from the harsh winter elements

FEATURES: Soft and cozy faux fur lining in hood keeps you warm and snug; Removable faux fur trim on the oversized hood offers versatility; Ribbed knit storm cuffs protect your hands and lower arms; Two spacious front zip pockets and a full zipper closure
For the fashion-forward woman with comfort on her mind
body.description: Jessica Simpson Quilted Puffer Coat Stay warm all winter long in this cozy mid-length puffer coat by Jessica Simpson. It can be dressed up or down and is perfect for daily wear. The horizontal quilting offers a slimming silhouette while displaying effortless style. Its generous mid-length construction combined with an oversized faux fur lined hood is designed to protect you from the harsh winter elements. Water and wind resistant 100% polyester shell and insulated fill 85% Acrylic/15% Polyester plush faux fur lined hood and trim Machine Wash Cold

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For the fashion-forward woman with comfort on her mind, the Jessica Simpson outerwear collection is always delivering femininity and style while keeping you warm and cozy all winter long. Jessica Simpson Quilted Puffer Coat Stay warm all winter long in this cozy mid-length puffer coat by Jessica Simpson. It can be dressed up or down and is perfect for daily wear. The horizontal quilting offers a slimming silhouette while displaying effortless style. Its generous mid-length construction combined with an oversized faux fur lined hood is designed to protect you from the harsh winter elements. Water and wind resistant 100% polyester shell and insulated fill 85% Acrylic/15% Polyester plush faux fur lined hood and trim Machine Wash Cold

Cozy Faux Fur Lined Hood Shield your face and ears from the cold with the additional warmth from the soft faux fur lined hood. Full Zipper Closure Easy on and off with the full front zipper closure. Removeable Faux Fur Trim Customize your every day look with our without the soft faux fur trim. Two Front Zipper Pockets Store your essentials while on the go in the spacious two front zipper pockets.

reviews.reviewerName: Not thermal type. More like a thick stretchy flannel material.  Run small. Easy to put fingernail thru! But are warm.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely everything you want in a winter coat. Style, warmth, quality and comfortable fit. Buy this coat. I ordered small. 5', 100 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PUFFER COAT!
reviews.reviewText: Jessica Simpson is known for good quality products and style. I was a bit skeptical when I saw it was coming from China but overall I’m glad I ordered it. The only thing is I need to figure out how to “comb the faux fur” so that it does not look stiff. But I LOVE my puffer coat. I ordered beige and dark blue. Both are gorgeous! And I love the gold hardware…, zippers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars warm and pretty color.
reviews.reviewText: its a mauve color. so nice flattering and warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, young style
reviews.reviewText: The jacket is cute and fits great, however the style is more fitted towards a teen or 20 something year old, not a woman pushing 40. I will be returning, but here are some pros & cons.Pros - I'm 5'5, 160 lbs, wear a size 10 jeans, size medium shirt, and am a 34DDD top and the medium coat fit great. The material is puffy and would probably be pretty warm paired with a sweater. The hood lining is so soft and it's big and plush. The length is perfect for what I was looking for and hit me mid thigh.Cons - the style isn't for me. The material of the black jacket is really shiny and the zippers are all gold. There is also a strange cinch cord along the back waist area I'm assuming is so you can cinch for a more fitted look, but you then have this random cord hanging down your backside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really questioning the quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a gift for my grandma, she loves anything pink so I chose the dusty pink color. The pink is slightly darker in person. The jacket itself seems nice, love the shape and length. It has adjustable strings to cinch in the waist. A removable faux fur on the hood but some of the faux fur arrived already stuck in the zipper. Over the entirety of the coat, there were several loose threads and threads that needed to be trimmed. Believe me when I say it was all over the entire coat. I had to take a break from trimming them all away.In the back of the coat, up close, you can see thread holes as if it was sewn wrong, threads were pulled and re-sewn along the quilted pattern look. I really don’t know what to say about this. I only noticed because I was trimming all the loose, dangling threads. From a regular distance away, I don’t think it’ll be noticeable. However… It looks cheaply put together and I tried to fix it the best I can to make it presentable as a christmas gift.If I had seen this exact jacket hanging in a store in this condition, I most definitely would not have purchased it unless it was deeply discounted.I have not noticed any holes though, and all zippers work as they should.I tried the coat on myself, it did feel warm and plush, the inside of the hood is very soft. I am hoping my grandma will like it.One positive, so I am not ending this on a bad note, shipping was faster than predicted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had ordered this in a size extra large and I had it replaced with size large. I love the coat. It's nice and warm.❣️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This coat was exactly as advertised - quality, value, style!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made & backwards zipper!
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 different colors, and both are VERY POORLY MADE. There’s extra thread everywhere! It looks like the needle didn’t catch and the thread kept going, then it finally caught again and the sewer just kept going without addressing the problem. I can’t just trim them off or it will all come undone. Also the fur on the hood looks nothing like the photos… It doesn’t look fluffy, it looks flat and ratty. Also, instead of the fur being on the edge of the hood (like how it usually is), it’s on a big weird “flap” that you have to try to flip back onto the rest of the hood juuuuust right and hope it somehow stays. No snaps or anything to help it stay in place, and heaven forbid the wind blows. Finally, the zipper is backwards (the pull is on the left like on men’s wear).I usually like Jessica Simpson’s clothes, but these parkas are JUNK. They’re both so defective & poorly made that I had to return both. Soooo disappointed.

reviews.reviewerName: Its flat and no radiance or color payoff. It does seem to be a knock off. It does not show up on skin and I bought the medium.DO NOT WASTE your money girls. You've been warned!!!
reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing quality coat but size down
reviews.reviewText: Coat is absolutely beautiful and very warm. The fabric has a sheen to it so it looks very luxurious in the tan color like a deep champagne. The hood is fully lined in a soft fur and framed with a nice big hood with matching (different type) fur. Gold Hardware elevates the look. Inside is lined with a bit of leopard and pink piping. Pockets are deep. I like the drawstring waist and the way it graduates a bit longer in the back.Just make sure you size down by 1 size than what you normally buy. I always take a large in coats but after reading reviews (thanks guys) I ordered a medium and it is still a bit roomy but in a good way. The seller has amazing customer service so if you're on the fence just get it! Thank me later!

The jacket is high quality material and fits perfectly! There is a draw string in the back which gives a nice detail and also helps to give more shape to the jacket. The lining around the neck area is super soft and luxurious. I really like the cuffs at the wrist as they are snug and provide good protection against the cold. Finally the zipper is high quality and is a nice gold colour which compliments the tan jacket. I’m very happy with this purchase!
This is a dream of a winter coat. Jessica Simpson never disappoints!! I chose the pink one and it’s even lovelier in person. Very warm. Deep pockets. Checks all the boxes. J’adore 💕
Cute, fits a bit large, I'd order a size down if you're hoping for a more fitted coat. Nice and warm!
